comments:
HistoryStoreTest is failing when running as session test. Need to investigate.
Will not release until it can be fixed.

testBug28603(org.eclipse.core.tests.internal.localstore.HistoryStoreTest)

Found the problem... session tests run on a separate location than regular test,
and in that location, the default max file states preference was set to 500
(left behind by some test that did not clean up properly). The problem is that
the existing implementation chokes when there are more than 128 (or 256, not
sure) changes for the same file system timestamp, so it was missing states.

Fixed the test by ensuring that all tests clean-up after themselves and that the
preference has a reasonable value for the failing test.
